data.title: Mars and the Mind of Man by Carl Sagan
data.meta_description: Mars and the Mind of Man by Ray Bradbury, Arthur C. Clarke, Bruce Murray, Carl Sagan, Wa and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good +. First Edition/First Printing. A square solid tight clean unread unused copy. The 7.95 priced jacket does however have some lightish edge wear, lightish tanning to extremities. A previous owner decided that he would follow the example of the local public library and used clear tape to keep from losing the jacket. No damage caused to the book but there are several scars and tape residue to the reverse of the jacket caused by the tape removal. THIS COPY IS IN MY POSSESSION AND WILL NORMALLY SHIP NEXT DAY. Book.

Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. First. A near fine copy in red cloth with gilt titles on spine A small water spot on front cover and very slight bumping at corners and spine ends Otherwise, in pristine condition Unclipped DJ is also excellent, with just very slight edge wear Now in protective mylar cover Signed by both Arthur C Clarke and Ray Bradbury on title page A certificate of authenticity is laid inside the front cover Overall an excellent copy signed by two towering figures in science and science fiction "Gift Quality" 143 pp.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. 1st Edition. ***** This is the true first edition, first printing (with "FIRST EDITION" stated on the copyright page, and with no later printings listed). ***** This book is SIGNED by three of the authors (Carl Sagan, Arthur C. Clarke and Ray Bradbury) on the second page. The authors did not inscribe this book to anyone; it is just signed by Sagan, Clarke and Bradbury. ***** Very nice hardcover with dust jacket. There is NO writing and NO bookplates. There are NO remainder marks. ***** It is NOT a book club edition and NOT a former library book. The dust jacket IS price-clipped ($ price-clipped). **** CONDITION: The book is in FINE condition, and the dust jacket is in NEAR FINE condition.***** We include new mylar (clear) dust jacket protectors with all books at no charge. ***** OUR GUARANTEE TO YOU: All books are guaranteed to be as described. We believe that no sale is complete until you are happy. Any book is returnable for a full refund (including postage) if you're not 100% satisfied. All books are packaged very carefully and shipped via insured USPS Mail with Tracking/Delivery Confirmation.***** Thank you! Richard Vick, Modern First Editions (Buying and Selling Modern First Editions since 1982). Signed by Author(s).
